div.p: The authors would like to thank all the fishers for their kind support and patience. We also thank the technical team of the “Projeto de Monitoramento Participativo do Desembarque Pesqueiro (PMPDP) sponsored by Petrobras. The authors would also like to thank Dr. James Cowan Jr. from the Louisiana State University (LSU), who to supervised MJFTS during his Post-Doctoral Grant (CAPES, 1728/14-8). URS thanks the Social Sciences and Humanities Research Council of Canada for its support of the OceanCanada Partnership. MGP received financial support from Coordenação de Aperfeiçoamento de Pessoal de Nível Superior (CAPES), as a Post-Doctoral Grant (88881.030502. 2013-01). MGP would also like to thank the Project iSEAS, Ref. LIFE13 ENV/ES/000131, “Knowledge-Based Innovative Solutions to Enhance Adding-Value Mechanisms towards Healthy and Sustainable EU Fisheries”, co-funded under the LIFE + Environmental Program of the European Union.
